description: A React component that provides a dropdown interface for switching between organizations, loading organization data from an API, persisting selection in local storage, and navigating to create a new organization.

methods.name: OrgSwitcher
methods.description: React functional component that renders an organization switcher dropdown.

methods.name: loadOrgs
methods.description: Fetches list of organizations from API and sets the current organization based on stored ID or defaults.

methods.name: selectOrg
methods.description: Sets the selected organization, saves its ID to local storage, and reloads the page.
